/v1/version¶

Contents

  • /v1/version

GET /v1/version¶

Retrieve the server version number

Response status codes¶

  • 200: OK

Output¶

Name Mandatory Type Description
version ✔ string Version number human readable

POST /v1/version¶

Check if version is the same as the server

Response status codes¶

  • 200: Same version
  • 409: Invalid version

Input¶

Name Mandatory Type Description
version ✔ string Version number human readable

Output¶

Name Mandatory Type Description
version ✔ string Version number human readable
